name: Warp
description: Defines a warp point that transports players to a new position.

fields.name: Warp Type
fields.description: Defines the type of warp and how the player enters the new area.

5.name: Sword Raise Smoke
5.description: Link holds sword up and appears in smoke.

6.name: Magic Circle
6.description: Link spins in a magic circle with light deformation.

7.name: Falling Down Map (Point)
7.description: Player falls down the map at a specific point.

8.name: Falling Down Map (Layer)
8.description: Player falls down the map layer.

9.name: Flickering Hole Fall
9.description: Link falls down a hole with a flickering appearance.

14.name: Whirlpool
14.description: Water to side view transition via whirlpool.

15.name: Emerge from Water
15.description: Transition from side view to water surface.

21.name: North Entrance to Side View
21.description: Entrance north changes to side view or side view exit.

22.name: South Entrance to Side View
22.description: Entrance south changes to side view or side view exit.

23.name: East Entrance to Side View
23.description: Entrance east changes to side view or side view exit.

24.name: West Entrance to Side View
24.description: Entrance west changes to side view or side view exit.

25.name: Default North Entrance
25.description: Default entrance from the north with auto return.

26.name: Default South Entrance
26.description: Default entrance from the south with auto return.

27.name: Default East Entrance
27.description: Default entrance from the east with auto return.

28.name: Default West Entrance
28.description: Default entrance from the west with auto return.

32.name: Desert Pit
32.description: Player falls into a desert pit.

35.name: Side View to Top View (North)
35.description: Side view entrance transitioning to top view (north).

fields.name: Destination Y
fields.description: The Y coordinate where the players arrive.

fields.name: Destination X
fields.description: The X coordinate where the players arrive.

fields.name: Layer
fields.description: The layer where the players arrive.

fields.name: Activation Variable
fields.description: The local variable that activates this warp. Always active if set to 0.
